item.description:
This was sent to me by the Boston area Lunachix, they have a great running and cycling group and this event is a nice social event as well as has short films by women. You can check out all the details here http://www.bostonluna... as we as some info if you are interested in joining up with these lovely ladies for one of their weekly runs! It is a great group and one more run for all the ladies in the BRMG to add to their weekly calendar!

Thanks!

Jen

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Lunafest
